author: James Gordon Meek, Lucien Bruggeman
title: CDC head downplays COVID-19 models, says deaths will be 'much lower' than projected
description: The CDC director said Monday that the death toll from the novel coronavirus will be “much, much, much lower” than models have projected.
content:
One of the nations top public health officials suggested Monday that because Americans are taking social distancing recommendations to heart, the death toll from the novel coronavirus will be much, much, much lower than models have projected.
If we just soci… [+2994 chars]
